content: I'll execute the /ship command to deploy this project. Let me start by checking the project configuration.
The project doesn't have explicit `ship-targets` defined in CLAUDE.md, but I can see it has GitHub remote configured. Let me check for Zeabur configuration in the global instructions.

Good! I can see there are pending changes. Since the project-level CLAUDE.md doesn't specify `ship-targets`, I'll use GitHub as the deployment target (since it's configured). Let me now prepare and commit the changes.

{
  "command": "git add . && git commit -m "data: update chat messages and hooks with streaming reveal improvements

- Update BuildPanel and ChatContent components
- Enhance useClaudeChat and useStreamingReveal hooks
- Add new chat message records"",
  "description": "Stage all changes and create commit"
}
Perfect! Now let me push to GitHub.

Done! I've successfully shipped the project to GitHub.

## 部署結果

**GitHub 推送**：✅ 成功
- Commit: `data: update chat messages and hooks with streaming reveal improvements`
- 推送目標: `https://github.com/TWBY/Todo-Dashboard.git` (main branch)
- 包含 11 個檔案變更，4 個新的聊天訊息記錄

所有變更已推送到遠端 GitHub 儲存庫。
